Header: IGP Pujith and former Defence secretary Hemasiri hospitalised as they are called before CID today
Content: A senior police spokesman stated that doctors are inspecting the health condition of IGP Pujith Jayasundera after he was admitted to police hospital this morning. Pujith Jayasundera, who is on compulsory leave, had been ordered to report to the CID at 10 Oâ€™clock today. Meanwhile, former defence secretary Hemasiri Fernando had also been ordered to report to the CID this morning. However, Fernando has also been admitted to hospital. Hemasiri Fernando told our news team that he sought CID permission to report there and makes a statement on July 8 th . However, a senior spokesman from the CID told our news team that his department has not yet informed IGP Pujith Jayasundera or Hemasiri Fernando not to report to the CID today. The Attorney General informed the Acting IGP Chandana Wickramarathna yesterday to name the duo as respondents of the Easter Sunday attacks as there is sufficient evidence against them.
